alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 7:45AM CST until March 01 at 8:30AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Johnson County in north central Texas... Southeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 830 AM CST. * At 745 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rendon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Burleson, Midlothian, Forest Hill, Kennedale, Everman, Alvarado, Rendon, Ovilla, Pantego, Cross Timber and Cedar Hill State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 31 and 39. Interstate 20 between mile markers 438 and 461. Interstate 30 between mile markers 27 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
